Title: Marriage: Impossible
Writer: Noor Arnaoot, Noor Arnaoot (story), Loay Elsayed
Actors: Beth Broderick, Brett Cullen, Sammy Sheik, Alicia Vita Jones
Plot: A fun, culture-clash, fish-out-of-water wedding comedy involving two very different families bought together by marriage, who are forced to meet, interact, clash and ultimately find ways to be with one another.
